issue.title: Virtual WFS can't be displayed in QGIS
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

I tried to add a Virtual WFS in QGIS but it is not shown.

With QGIS 2.4 or QGIS 2.6 if I try to add a feature from this service : 
http://www.tigeo.fr/proxy/wfs-tigeo

I got this error : 
Échec de DescribeFeatureType pour l'url http://www.tigeo.fr/proxy/wfs-tigeo?test=1&SERVICE=WFS&VERSION=1.0.0&REQUEST=GetFeature&TYPENAME=tigeo:communes_tarn_3857&SRSNAME=EPSG:3857

No problem with the physical service : 
http://www.tigeo.fr/geoserver/tigeo/wfs

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

*Direct:*
http://www.tigeo.fr/geoserver/tigeo/wfs?SERVICE=WFS&REQUEST=DescribeFeatureType&VERSION=1.0.0&TYPENAME=tigeo:communes_tarn_3857

```

<code class="xml">
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><xsd:schema xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" xmlns:tigeo="http://www.tigeo.fr" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.tigeo.fr">
  <xsd:import namespace="http://www.opengis.net/gml" schemaLocation="https://www.tigeo.fr/geoserver/schemas/gml/2.1.2/feature.xsd"/>
  <xsd:complexType name="communes_tarn_3857Type">
    <xsd:complexContent>
      <xsd:extension base="gml:AbstractFeatureType">
        <xsd:sequence>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="the_geom" nillable="true" type="gml:MultiPolygonPropertyType"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="ID_GEOFLA" nillable="true" type="xsd:long"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="CODE_COMM" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="INSEE_COM" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="NOM_COMM" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="STATUT" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="X_CHF_LIEU" nillable="true" type="xsd:int"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Y_CHF_LIEU" nillable="true" type="xsd:int"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="X_CENTROID" nillable="true" type="xsd:int"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Y_CENTROID" nillable="true" type="xsd:int"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="Z_MOYEN" nillable="true" type="xsd:int"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="SUPERFICIE" nillable="true" type="xsd:long"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="POPULATION" nillable="true" type="xsd:double"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="CODE_CANT" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="CODE_ARR" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="CODE_DEPT" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="NOM_DEPT" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="CODE_REG" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/>
          <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="NOM_REGION" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"/>
        </xsd:sequence>
      </xsd:extension>
    </xsd:complexContent>
  </xsd:complexType>
  <xsd:element name="communes_tarn_3857" substitutionGroup="gml:_Feature" type="tigeo:communes_tarn_3857Type"/>
</xsd:schema>

```


*Via proxy:*
http://www.tigeo.fr/proxy/wfs-tigeo?SERVICE=WFS&REQUEST=DescribeFeatureType&VERSION=1.0.0&TYPENAME=tigeo:communes_tarn_3857
```

<code class="xml">
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" xmlns:tigeo="http://www.tigeo.fr" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.tigeo.fr">
  <xsd:import namespace="http://www.opengis.net/gml" schemaLocation="https://www.tigeo.fr/geoserver/schemas/gml/2.1.2/feature.xsd"/>
  
  <xsd:element name="communes_tarn_3857" substitutionGroup="gml:_Feature" type="tigeo:communes_tarn_3857Type"/>
</xsd:schema>
```
